name: Stuffed Cod Wrapped in Bacon
author: BRADYSMOM17
summary: An easy, different way to grill fish fillets and make people think you slaved all day.
directions: Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat
Soak some toothpicks in water while the grill heats up
Spread a thin layer of sesame oil and chili sauce onto one side of each fish fillet
At one end, place some of the leek and a couple of mushrooms
Wrap each roll with a slice of bacon, and secure with two toothpicks
Place on the preheated grill, and cook covered for 5 minutes
Be careful of flare-ups from the bacon grease
Turn over, and cook for 5 more minutes, until bacon is crisp and fish flakes easily
